LAKE CITY, MI 49651

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:00 AM on
03FEB2022.
Inspector contacted the licensee by calling the first cell number, there was no answer, and a message was left. Inspector
called the second phone number, the licensee stated he was too far away to conduct an inspection. The inspector
received a phone call back from the first cell number and the licensee would not be back in the area until afternoon. The
licensee stated that there was no one else available to conduct the animal welfare inspection.
Additional Inspectors:
JUSTINE O MALLEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:00 AM on 
03FEB2022. 
 
Inspector contacted the licensee by calling the first cell number, there was no answer, and a message was left.  Inspector 
called the second phone number, the licensee stated he was  too far away to conduct an inspection.  The inspector 
received a phone call back from the first cell number and the licensee would not be back in the area until afternoon.  The 
licensee stated that there was no one else available to conduct the animal welfare inspection. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
JUSTINE O MALLEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
